Pre-Game Insights: Los Angeles has a 52-29 record at home and a 98-64 record overall.
The Dodgers are 77-15 in games when they scored at least five runs.
New York has gone 50-31 in road games and 94-68 overall.
The Yankees have the fifth-ranked team ERA in the AL at 3.75.
The Dodgers are up 3-1 in the season series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Saturday's game is the fifth time these teams square off this season.
Shohei Ohtani has 38 doubles, seven triples and 54 home runs for the Dodgers.
Tommy Edman is 14-for-41 with four doubles and a home run over the past 10 games.
Bill Belichick reportedly garnering NFL interest after accepting UNC job.
Bill Belichick said he didn't take the UNC job just 'to leave.'

Gleyber Torres is 13-for-42 with a home run and five RBI over the last 10 games.
